attributes.additional_details: There is no NEED for firework displays anymore. I feel we have honestly progressed so much that we should be smart enough to know they are bad PTSD sufferers, extremely bad and dangerous for animals and the environment. I have anxiety and cannot stand fireworks - they are terrifying. They kill animals and greenery every single year. If the government wants to show that it’s doing something to help the environment - banning fireworks is a good start.
attributes.background: Legally ban all fireworks sales and displays in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
